resources.string: Your will not be able to change the passcode after setting it here. Be sure to remember it as you cannot retrieve your passwords without it.
Set the passcode with which you will encrypt and decrypt your passwords:
Set the name of the stored password, which will help you identify it when retrieving it and then type the password itself, along with the key for its encryption.
Your password will be encrypted using the given key and will then be stored under the name given. You can later decrypt it with the same key to retrieve it.
Choose the name of the password you want to retrieve.
Use your key to decrypt the stored password and get your original password.
